1313265177647742978.name: Linda Xie
1313265177647742978.content:
What are good books relevant for crypto people to read that aren't specifically about crypto?

A few of my suggestions - Working in Public (open source software), Get Together (community building), Crypto (cryptography), One from Many (history of Visa), How the Internet Happened
